allow: Bash(then find facturas/duplicados -name "*.pdf" -exec sh -c 'for f; do rel=""${f#facturas/duplicados/}""; dest=""documentos/procesados/duplicados/$rel""; mkdir -p ""$(dirname ""$dest"")""; cp ""$f"" ""$dest""; done' sh {} +)

Bash(then find facturas/errores -name "*.pdf" -exec sh -c 'for f; do rel=""${f#facturas/errores/}""; dest=""documentos/procesados/errores/$rel""; mkdir -p ""$(dirname ""$dest"")""; cp ""$f"" ""$dest""; done' sh {} +)
